name: Timothy Sagely
text: I had a set of wheels spoked today at Spinning Spoke Cycles and was very satisfied with the service and very nice ppl, I will be back to do more business with those guys. Great Service. I'll show more when finished.  God is Great.

name: Julie Pitts
text: Really friendly staff! Great stock of high end bikes. We were looking for something specific they did not carry but they still went above and beyond to help us get the information we needed. Really good people!

name: Chuck Creamer
text: Nice bike shop.  Very helpful.  Did not know this was there until I found them online. Worth seeing

name: Jason Holt
text:
Fantastic local professional bike shop!
Very much appreciate the customer service and willingness to make sure we had a great bike purchase experience.  Thank you guys very much!  The bikes are awesome!

name: Eric Manduca
text: STAFF WAS VERY HELPFUL AND KNOWLEDGEABLE WILL DEF BE BACK AGAIN.

name: Amy Crews
text: I have purchased two Trek bikes from Spinning Spoke. Every time I go in the store for something the employees are attentive and knowledgeable and really care that I have the best experience with my bikes. Highly recommend!

name: Tyler Smith
text: The staff is knowledgeable, kind, and eager to assist, all while not applying undue pressure. The store carries a good inventory of quality bikes and accessories. And they offer great advice for maintaining your bike, which is quite helpful for the novice cyclist like myself.

name: Michael Schneider
text: Great shop and employees.  Work is done right the first time.  Overall a great experience and will be back again.

name: Joey Holt
text: The entire staff was very knowledgeable about all of their products. They really seemed to value me as a customer.

name: Ehrrensmommy
text: I have nothing but positive words about this business and it’s staff.  The best experience my husband and I could have had!!  From the moment we walked in the door the atmosphere and customer service was amazing!!  We worked with Jeffery and Max I think was his name!!  I felt so comfortable and was giving so much helpful information.  We were not rushed, pushed or up sold!!  We live like an hour away and will drive here anytime we need servicing or need anything related to our new bikes!!  Thank you!!!

name: Todd Perry
text: These guys put a BB and crank on my bike while I waited. I was out of there in 45 min. It might have been a slow Monday afternoon for them and I was lucky they had the parts in stock but same day service on a bike repair these days is unheard of.

name: Michael Cottrell
text: These guys are great!  I bought a 2021 Trek Checkpoint from them.  I’m from Georgia and was met in Birmingham with the bike.  Amazing customer service!  Also, I needed a shorter seat post and they hooked me up with one too.  I would highly recommend this bike shop!!

name: Angela Lawler
text: Bryce is awesome! Great customer service. Highly recommend!

name: Pam Butler
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, always make me feel appreciated.

name: Tabitha Ray
text: I was very pleased with my experience at The Spinning Spoke. If you are looking for an excellent customer service experience, this is the place to go.

name: Kristy Blackburn
text: Helpful and friendly!  Great selection of bikes and accessories.

name: Matt Williams
text: Got my first road bike here recently. They helped me alot during the process! I'll definitely be shopping here more in the future.

name: Teresa Sesler
text: The folks at Spinning Spoke are top shelf! Very knowledgeable and friendly staff! My wife and I have been a customer of theirs every since they started in the Bicycle business! The Shoals area is very fortunate to have a “true” bike sales and service outfit!

name: Tony E
text: Nice folks, good selection

name: Lynn Reese
text: Bought a 3 wheel bike for my daughter with downs. They guys at Spinning Spoke were great and let her try it out to make sure that she could ride it. It is red and she loves it!

name: Harrison Womack
text: Super friendly and easy to work with. They hooked me up with a very slick Checkpoint AL 4 that rides very smooth and comfortable for me! If anyone is wanting to get into cycling you've got to go to The Spinning Spoke for all your bicycling needs! 10/10!

name: Tracy Churchwell
text: Staff was very helpful, they helped me pick out the right bike and correct size for my needs. They had a bigger inventory than bike shops anywhere around. Highly recommend any one looking for a bike give these guys your business.

name: Loren McCoy
text: Great shop!  Our family gets all of our bicycles from here.

name: john cicala
text: Everyone here is incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and wonderful to work with. They enjoy what they do and it really makes a difference.

name: Timothy Helms
text: A great local place for all your bike needs. I had been looking for a hybrid Trek for a months. I walked in the store and found a great deal with friendly service. I highly recorded giving The Spinning Spoke a visit.

name: Eric Meyer
text: Eero was great and very helpful. I'll be back.

name: rhee perry
text:
Bought our daughter a bike here a few years ago, and the service was incredible. Just bought myself a new bike and the purchase couldn’t have been easier.

The family rides make this bike shop a true community bike shop!

name: Clay Thompson
text: Spinning Spoke had the bike in stock and promptly put it together before the end of the day. Great service and selection of bikes.

name: Charles Wickwire
text: I greatly appreciate the experienced mechanics, those talented repair people who keep my bike in fine tune.  They are always willing to take short look to make sure all is well or do the bigger repair.  And, the product selection of bikes and accessories is just what we need.  Good quality products that I can rely on.Bicycling is about safe riding and the the sheer fun of riding.  Everyone at the Spinning Spoke has that same focus and enthusiasm.We have needed a first rate bicycle shop in town and I am very thankful that the Spinning Spoke is here.

name: Mark Holley
text: Great bike shop! Pleasure to do business with!

name: Jon Goggans
text: Great folks.  Braxton is the best.  But they are all super helpful.  Will be back!

name: Brad Black
text: The service is unprecedented! In a time where most businesses treat you like a number it’s so refreshing to be treated like you’re the only customer at The Spinning Spoke! I’ve been riding Trek products since 2015 and have been very pleased with the bikes and the warranty!

name: Ben Bowling
text: They were SUPER helpful and provided fast, quality work.

name: River Mayo
text: Very helpful. Very nice people and a great atmosphere! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Mike Marks
text: The Spinning Spoke staff was great in completely updating my 30 year old city bike and when I bought a new electric bike that was out of stock they drove to south Alabama to pick one up for me; they are very knowledgeable also. Thanks Mike Marks

name: Bethany Batchelor
text: Been using them for a little over two years now. Always helpful and friendly! Couldn’t ask for better service.

name: The Cool Kiddos
text: Good, honesty company with employees who go above and beyond for good service! They replaced a tube for me and when we had problems again a couple months later, they fixed it, no charge, because it was their mistake that caused it to go flat the second time. We have 5 kids, and 3 bikes from Spinning Spoke. I’m sure it won’t be much longer til we have 2 more from them. I highly recommend them. And we love the kids trade-up program too!!

name: Cale Kress
text: Awesome experience and very helpful and friendly staff!

name: Whitney Moore
text: Guys in the shop where so great to work with that we went back 1 week after buying the first bike to purchase the second one!!

name: Lisa Rickard
text: Blessed to have this wonderful shop in Florence! The staff is always super friendly and very knowledgeable!! They also go above & beyond to promote riding in our community and keep our trails clean & clear!

name: Justin Carter PhD
text: They were very helpful through each step and I am very happy with my purchase.

name: Ashley R. Anderson (Stella's Planet)
text: Extremely knowledgeable staff and great customer service! Also, the trade-in bike plan for kids is a life saver.  It allows us to buy good quality bikes for them, without having to worry about how quickly they outgrow each one. In fact, I would say that program is 99% of what kept us coming back for the first couple of years.  Now... we wouldn't even consider shopping somewhere else for our bikes and bike gear.

name: Paige Sandlin
text: Jeffery was so sweet to Joel by helping him pick out a bike for his birthday, and nifty accessories. He even set everything up for us! He made sure his helmet fit perfectly. That made me feel good knowing that his little noggin will be safe and secure during a ride! We had a wonderful experience, and this Mama will be back to pick out a bike for her birthday!

name: Robert Newsom
text: In store, hands on bike fit is a necessity. Thank you at The Spoke for keeping new inventory coming in!

name: GolfBikeJeep Repeat
text: I purchased a bike from them online. Eero and Timothy ensures the bike was tuned to my specs and personally DELIVERED to me in Birmingham. Absolutely awesome. 10/10.

name: Jeremiah Stillings
text: Very awesome shop. The tech was super knowledgeable all the way back to Schwinn's world tour days. I had a great time there today and will return even if I am not looking for a new bike because the staff is awesome.

name: Sajel Speyrer
text: Easy to work with and was a great help in find the right size bikes for my kids.

name: Ted Roberts
text: Spinning Spoke is a great place to get a ride!  The folks working there are great!  Love my two Townies and plan on getting a ebike as well!

name: Melinda Smith
text: Had a great purchase experience! The staff is super helpful, friendly and supportive. Just got our Trek Verve 2 bikes home and took a short spin to try them out. Loving them already! Would recommend The Spinning Spoke to anyone.

name: Jeff Smith
text: Great service, free test ride on Trek/Bosch electric bike while service was done. Highly recommended. Courteous and reasonably priced.

name: Kyle
text: I bought purchased my Trek road bike from Spinning Spoke about half a year ago and couldn't be happier. The staff was very helpful educating me on which product would be the right fit for my needs and they installed all the lights, clips, etc that I was also purchasing. The prices were fabulous and overall a very friendly/warm atmosphere.

name: Jeff Moon
text: The sales staff was very helpful.

name: Deborah Walker
text: Timothy and his team are the absolute best!  They are extremely knowledgeable, and their service is second to none.  Trek products are dependable, and I love riding both bikes I purchased from The Spinning Spoke.

name: Bradley Mifflin
text: If you are a Trek and Bontrager fan this is the spot. A great local bike shop. We need more places around like them. They do group rides and always have great service. Fun to just go in and chat.

name: allen mcdonald
text: We became stranded on the Natchez Trace Parkway due to flatting issues. We caught a ride to Florence and the spinning spoke had all the equipment we needed to get back to riding. The staff was friendly and was gracious to work us in so we could still make our B&B before dark!  Thanks guys!

name: Angela Purcell
text: The guys at the shop always answer any questions I have and they make every shopping experience great!!!

name: Scott Morris
text: Friendly service. Competent maintenance and repairs.

name: robert johannes
text: Helpful friendly and knowledgeable people thst care sbout their customer. Reliable and very reasonable. Good experience, but should have picked up some other accessories,  can't wait.

name: ANTHONY SOLONE
text: Jeff & Blaze rocked it! Those dudes are the best. Purchased a Roscoe 7 while there and they made my mind settled as I decided on my dream bike.

name: Even Steven
text: Friendly and professional. They know bikes and they know service. I consider them new friends.

name: Brianna Wolfgang
text: The people who helped me through my purchase were very friendly and helped me set up a payment plan that worked well with my budget. The two bikes that were purchased are beautiful and I get many compliments on them.

name: Blake Michael
text: Extremely helpful and really nice people. Can't reccomend them enough. Thanks guys

name: TL Bullington
text: Love these guys! They are absolutely the best!

name: Vanessa Romano (The Jeep Diva)
text: The three staff members that I had the pleasure of dealing with were courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.

name: Danny Mitchell
text:
I have had several bikes serviced at The Spinning Spoke Shoppe, all were serviced very well. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I will be buying my bike and supplies there. I give the shop a
5 star rating.

name: Michael Burgess
text: Always helpful, always professional!

name: Joshua Jackson
text: Great shop with good prices.

name: Lindsay Aycock
text: Very knowledgeable staff & excellent service!

name: Ron Gresham
text: they care about the customer and they are friendly     My  previous  one star review  is incorrect   Which was based on one   Occasion  and  miscommunication

name: Todd Ehlenfeldt
text: Nice clean shop. Replaced my tire & tube while I waited.

name: James Edwards
text: Great staff. Always willing to help solve any problems with my bike that I may have.

name: Jeffrey “jeff” Allen
text: The folks at spinning spokes are awesome and always provide excellent service

name: David Shockey
text: Excellent bike shop with a friendly and knowledgeable staff.

name: Tony Alexander
text: Good people, courteous and know their job

name: Pete Williams
text: Nice selection and good staff service.

name: Brock Armstrong
text: Expensive yet knowledgeable staff and friendly environment.

name: Sunflower Studios
text: Service with a smile!

name: Bradley Dean
text: Best bike shop in Florence. The only place to have your bicycle serviced too.

name: noah haddock
text: They fix bikes GRATE

name: David Zuwiyya
text: Trek Auburn recognized the piece that I wanted installed, they gave me a reasonable quote, did the service promptly, and charged exactly what was given in the quote. What more could you ask for? Thanks so much!

resp.text:
Thank you very much David. It was fun helping you get going.
Ride Safe!

name: kevin horschel
text: Ben and the rest of the staff are fantastic! Trek of Auburn is a pillar of our cycling community outreach through NICA sponsorship as well as several other causes. They are my trusted “go to” for anything bike related. We have other local shops, but they do not provide he same genuine concern for making a customer feel comfortable and appreciated. Trek of Auburn has excellent predictable service and fast turn-around times.

resp.text:
Thank you Kevin
Ride Safe

name: Maxon Hartley
text: First time customer. Great experience.

name: Mike N
text: Ben and team were fantastic during my journey to find the right bike. I drove in from Georgia as they were the only store in the area with the bike I wanted. Super low pressure but there to guide and read what I was going for on both a bike and accessories. Great experience and thanks again!

resp.text:
Thank you very much Mike
Ride Safe!

name: Gid Alston
text: These folks give excellent service at a reasonable price. This is by far the best bike shop I have ever used.

resp.text:
Thank you very much Gid
Ride Safe!

name: As Roath
text: Excellent and thorough service, courteous staff. Nice experience.

resp.text:
Thank you
Ride safe!

name: Mark Morales
text: Your team did a great job making us feel welcome and getting my daughter into a new, well size bike. Thanks!

resp.text:
Thank you very much Mark. It was great joy to help her get riding
Ride Safe!

name: J H
text:
It's obvious from the get-go, this is is a business that cares about what you want.  Their service is impeccable and they go above and beyond.  After talking with the owner I was happily surprised with the laid back feel, and they were able to answer all my questions knowledgeably and clearly.

I've known the manager for years.  He is meticulous and takes great pride in his work.  A perfectionist when it comes to tune ups,  no matter what brand or age of bike you bring him.  He has an eye and appreciation for the finer details.

Catch up with him at Chewacla, the local mountain bike park where he can be found riding the trails with his friends or family,  and sometimes hosting a bike demo for fun in his spare time.

resp.text:
Thank you Joe for your kind words
Ride Safe!!

name: Lindsey Hern
text: Exceptional customer service! They truly take care of their customers! These people are so knowledgeable about all of their products and everything bikes. They made good suggestions and didn’t try to over sell at all. 11/10 service.

resp.text:
Thnk you Lindsey
Ride Safe!

name: Ross Lewallen
text:
Excellent service, very competent, and super easy to deal with.

A couple of months ago I drove the five-hour round trip adventure to Trek Bicycle Auburn with a friend who was purchasing a bike that they had on hand.  After talking with Ben, the manager, I was pretty impressed with the business and the level of knowledge and technical skills the staff demonstrated.  I was impressed enough that I returned last week with my Canyon for a much needed tune up and preventative maintenance.  JT and James took a lot of time with me to ensure that they fully understood what I wanted while simultaneously inputting their maintenance advice to absolutely ensure that my servicing plan was exactly what I needed.  I valued their advice because as part of my service I wanted new cables, chain, front disk brake (slight warp), and new wheel bearings.  They agreed with the cables and chain but went out of their way to straighten the disk brake and clean, inspect, and re-grease the bearings, which of course wound up being a much greater value for the money, at least on my side of the deal.  I have around 100 miles on the service and the replacement parts and the service adjustments and tuning are perfect. These small things combined with the quality of the final product earn Trek Bicycles of Auburn a great deal of trust from me, which in turn ensures that I will make that tedious drive every time I need service for my bike.  Additionally, for new bike purchases and bike accessory needs the store has many bikes on hand and nearly every accessory that one should want or need.  Thanks Team!

resp.text:
Thank you Ross
Ride safe

name: David Pearson
text: Great bike store.  Knowledgeable staff.

resp.text:
Thank you David
Ride Safe

name: Laura Olds
text: During an exceptionally busy time, the staff was friendly and communicated clearly. I had attached fenders to my road bike, but was having trouble with adjusting them so they wouldn't rub.  They told me that fenders on road bikes could be finicky and didn't make me feel incompetent. The adjustment was complete within a couple hours. Another great experience!

resp.text:
Thank you for a great review
Ride Safe

name: Dale Meeks
text: Great people to work with!! Very knowledgeable. Ben was great!!!

resp.text:
Thank you Dale
Ride safe

name: Bobby Rowland
text: Great shop. Highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you Bobby
Ride Safe

name: Jackie Young
text: The salesman was just awesome, extremely helpful, and not pushy at all. They delivered my bike same day and I’ve been on it every day since.  Love it!!!

resp.text:
Thank you
Ride safe!

name: Dale Lee
text: The work on my Trek 930 was completed competently & professionally and my Bike was ready for pickup at the promised time.

resp.text:
Thank you
Ride Safe

name: Teresa Hall
text: I visited this store on a Saturday afternoon. The service was great, and the staff was knowledgeable and friendly. Unfortunately they did not have a gravel bike in the store to fit my 5'3" self, but found one in another store that they could bring over Tuesday or Wednesday; they took my name and number. The next weekend I called for a status check. They had overlooked getting the bike in for me, but the very friendly guy who answered the phone said he would check with the warehouse on availability and call me back in about five minutes. It's been four weeks so it's apparent they aren't interested in my business. It's a shame, I am eager to buy a quality gravel bike and no one else in town has any in stock. Very disappointed.

resp.text: Hey Teresa; I am sorry to hear about the negative experience you had at the store. I addressed the issue with the manager. He said he has made adjustments in the procedures and discussed the issue with the team to avoid similar occurrences in the future. Thank you for your feed back

name: Chris Brown
text: Great, friendly service!  They took great care of my son and helped him make the right decision spending his birthday money.  Even gave him a free water bottle!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Nicholas Quinn
text: Great staff, very helpful. Will most likely use again when we purchase our next Trek.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jason Pope
text: These friendly folks did a fine job tuning up my bike; rides like new, looks great. Will definitely be a returning customer.

resp.text: Thank you Jason

name: Jeff Blackston
text: Awesome folks to deal with - very knowledgeable and super friendly.  Go see them for bikes,  service and gear!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Patrick Taylor
text: Very helpful, great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Estelle Cornell
text: Very nice and courteous and helped me out a lot

resp.text:
Thank you Estelle
Ride safe

name: Nick Boyle
text: The staff member Ben was extremely helpful. He took the time even when my questions and work order exceeded shop hours. He ensured I understood service and part options when getting some maintenance and service done on my bike.

resp.text:
Thank You I will be sure to let Ben know
Ride Safe!

name: Robin Kurtz
text: The folks at Trek bicycle have gone out of their way to help me. I got lessons in using an E bike and a house call on the bike got stuck in my SUV! I was referred to their store in Columbus to meet the needs of my road bike.I was turned on to a trainer for the bike and bypassed the high cost of a peloton. Nice people!

resp.text:
Thank you Robin
Ride safe!

name: Mark Grizzard
text: Helpful staff.  Good prices.

resp.text:
Thank you
Ride safe

name: Andy Tillman
text: Great Bikes, Great People, Providing Great Service and Expertise!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jimmy Bracht
text: Tried to sell me a bunch of things I didn’t actually need yet. I was quoted $240 to get my bike rideable so I went to James Bro’s Bikes and got it done for $14.

resp.text:
Hey Jimmy
Glad to hear James Brother’s was able to get you riding, they are a good crew over there.
Ride safe!

name: Bullish Nole
text: Took an older Trek in for repairs. Ben the manager was very knowledgeable and helpful. They also have a great selection of newer models. I took one home. If you want to ride or need anything bike related this is the place to go!

resp.text:
Thank You Joshua. I will be sure to share this with Ben
Ride Safe!!

name: David Sharpton
text: Was not happy with my previous bike shop.  Dropped in and chatted with the folks at Trek Auburn. Very pleased with my experience. Will recommend to my friends.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Josh S
text: Ben and Rick are both fantastic and incredibly helpful. This is a clean store that does great work. Took my bike in for a tune and some repairs and they did a great job! They've become my go-to bike shop in the area.

resp.text: Thank You Josh Ride Safe!!

name: Brent Wilson
text: Great service and very fast!

resp.text:
Thank you
Ride safe

name: Kevin Wilkinson
text: The customer service and friendliness of the staff are top notch.  They believe in taking care of their customers.  The knowledge of the staff to guide their customer whether it be for a new bike or service of a bike is second to none.

resp.text:
Thank You Kevin
Ride Safe!

name: Hunter Garris
text: Ben was very knowledgeable and helpful. He patiently answered all of my wife’s and my questions and went above and beyond in helping us select and set up our new bikes and equipment.

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words I will be sure to share this with Ben.
Ride Safe

name: joe best
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you

name: Ryan Marbut
text: From the moment I walked in the associate helped me greatly in finding the needed equipment for my bike at a reasonable price.

resp.text:
That is great to hear
Thank you Ryan
Ride Safe

name: Wendy Madison
text: Picked up a bike we won off the radio. Ben was super nice and helped me load it. Great store and wonderful service. Thanks Ben!

resp.text:
Thank you Wendy. I will be sure to past this on to Ben
Ride Safe
Rick

name: Jack Tomassetti
text: Last Minute, day before the big Bo Bikes Bama event my crank fell off due to my mistake.  I called up Rick & Ben, and they yanked one off a showroom bike and delivered to me so I could ride the next day!  Talk about service... these guys go over and beyond to take care of their customers.   Glad these guys are in town :)

resp.text:
Thank You Jack
We are glad we were able to help
Ride Safe

name: Shane Jones
text: Great Trek products and outstanding customer sales and service. Highly recommended!

resp.text:
Thank You Shane
Ride Safe

name: Zeb O'Bryant
text: friendly staff and quality products

resp.text:
Thank you Zeb  for your kind words
Ride Safe

name: Logan and Michole Unwork to Travel
text: Great service and great atmosphere!

resp.text:
Thank you for your review
Ride safe!

name: Andrew Hartley
text: Rick was great!  I highly recommend this bike shop!

resp.text:
Thank you Andrew
Ride Safe!!

name: Brett A. Snell
text: Good inventory and helpful staff.

resp.text:
Thank you!
Ride Safe!

name: Ty Ford
text: Great and friendly service !

resp.text:
Thank you Ty
Ride Safe

name: Daniel Post
text: Great service.

resp.text:
Thank You Daniel
Ride safe

name: Evan Chandler
text:
Kenny was a great salesman and extremely helpful to someone ready to buy their first quality bike. I told him my budget and he laid out the options within +/- ~$200 of it, while explaining exactly what benefits each bike had and how (if I wanted to) spending a bit more would save me in the effort of upgrading down the road.

I never felt pressured into going over my set limit and did not feel as though I was just dealing with someone trying to make a sale. He explained where each bike sat in performance levels and related specific components to the trails I would be riding on.

He recommended a Scott bike that was equipped with an air shock and remote lockout, both of which have been fantastic to have while out in the woods.

He also explained the current technology being used in helmets, assisting me in making the correct decision for the best protection, and even deciding on what color bottle cages/pedals would fit the bike. ("these flat black cages will complement the graphics on the bike. Yeah! Those yellow pedals will definitely work with the paint!")

Will definitely shop at Cahaba Cycles again and will call Kenny when I'm ready to upgrade to a full suspension!

name: Joseph Harter
text: Top notch bike shop! I drove 170 miles from Atlanta to buy a bike from them. Everything was ready when I got there and everyone was attentive and helpful. I was made to feel like I was more than welcome and left without having any questions that needed to be asked. Brian was amazing and helped me with everything while I was there. I would not hesitate to drive back for my next purchase. Happy Trails!

name: Kyle Hunter
text: Very knowledgeable staff and Gene, specifically, was great! They also have a huge selection of bikes. Gene was patient with me and explained all the features of the different bikes I was looking at and let me try them out behind the shop. Once I made my selection, they were able to get the bike adjusted in the time it took to pick out my accessories. I am completely satisfied with my purchase and experience and would highly recommend! I drove from Nashville to find the bike I wanted and it was worth it.

name: Uriel Cantu
text: Cahaba Cycles was able to accommodate me with a super hard to find Marlin 6 when no one else could within a 200 mile radius. Additionally, they pulled the bike from the warehouse, assembled it, and had it ready for me within 4 days. Lastly, the employee was friendly and very helpful as I had to make my trip from North Florida. Super satisfied!

name: Tony Bichler
text: Great people, fantastic prices.  Totally blows BackCountry away.  they also had the best deals, give Virginia or Matt a call

resp.text: thanks Tony! Hope you're enjoying the ride!

name: Sara Allbritton
text: The whole staff at Cahaba Cycles in Cahaba Heights are like family. My sons stop in there all the time to see the employees and to inquire about bike insights. The whole staff is courteous, helpful and very knowledgeable. Mike is like the Bike Doctor!

resp.text: Thank you Sara..we always love to see y’all! We appreciate the kind words!

name: Jim Crim
text: Great service, fast, reasonable prices, friendly knowledgeable staff.  Large selection of bikes and related merchandise.  These folks know how to run a business by meeting customer needs.

name: Danielle Brown
text: Prompt, professional service. I received same day turn around and assistance in loading my bike.

name: Dana D'Alessandro
text: Great, responsive and professional staff.  Easy to work with and meet my needs.

name: Will Davenport
text: Honest recommendation on the bike for my needs.  Great people and excellent service.

name: Glazell
text: Easy, fast online transaction. Received earlier than expected. Thank you.

name: Reed Estes
text: I have always had positive experiences with Cahaba Cycles, from purchasing children’s bikes to accessories, to even a cracked frame trade in. The sales and service staff have done a phenomenal job meeting my needs (worked predominantly with Mike Flowers, who knocked it out of the park).  I will definitely be back for future needs.

name: Adam Wende
text: The employee was knowledgeable and extremely helpful in repairing my daughter's bicycle.

name: David Link
text: Cahaba Cycles is a superior local bike shop.  I couldn't ask for more regarding my recent purchase.  They made sure I got a bike that worked for my age and size and it fit my price target.  Their bike fitting service is worth every penny.  The most important thing is that I'm excited about getting out on the road and I know that if I have any issues, then CC has my back.

name: Stan Davey
text: This was my first service visit and Mike was very helpful. The cost was very reasonable too.

resp.text: Thank you Stan! We appreciate the opportunity!

name: Justin Kirk
text:
Every Cahaba Cycles store I've ever been in deserves nothing short of 5 stars. They consistently provide exceptional customer service!

They are always willing to generously share their knowledge and answer all my questions. I highly trust Cahaba Cycles because they show integrity, give honest recommendations, and always try to make whatever it is right.

name: fred clarkonlyson
text: Competent bike technicians .Not sure they like doing business with someone who looks like me. Will try not to go back.

name: Caroline Sparrow
text: Excellent advice, guidance and service from the staff at Cahaba Heights store, particularly Virginia, Sarah, Mike and Kenny. Love my Trek bikes, and love that the staff make it easy to be a loyal Cahaba Cycles customer.

name: Trevor Ladner
text: The staff here was extremely friendly and very helpful finding what I needed. I had ordered something online, and there was an issue with the order, but they helped me out kindly and quickly, and I got what I needed. Also, the store exercised proper caution with social distancing, which made me really comfortable going there in person.

name: Tk Bham
text: What an awesome local bike shop.  People are so friendly, resourceful and, knowledgeable.

name: gabe mccleave
text: great staff. super helpful A++

name: W Brent Cook
text: Sarah had outstanding customer service. I highly recommend her. Outstanding job helping us with our Trek Marlin 5! Job well done!!!

resp.text: Thanks Brent - Sarah says hey and thanks!

name: Tina Zajch
text: Nice product selection, great customer service, knowledgable salespeople. Already recommended.

name: Jennifer Sykes
text: Knowing the bicycle business is slammed, we expected delay on finding the right bikes for our grandsons.  Cahaba Cycle was right on with assisting us and we got lucky that they had two in stock.  I really like that they just don't just assemble and send out.  They have a quality control process to ensure assembly was handled appropriately. and that the gears and functions are as expected. Great place to do business with!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time Jennifer .We thank your for your business. Hop the boys enjoy those bikes!

name: GolfBikeJeep Repeat
text: I had a negative experience at the Cahaba Heights location. After bringing this to the owner/manager’s attention, they quickly reached out to me and made it known they have received this complaint before and we’re actively working to correct it. Any company to address issues quickly is ok with me.

name: Justin Gilmore
text: Great experience here with a Bontrager shoe warranty claim and custom bike build for a friend just getting into the sport! Highly recommend!

name: Ben Weil
text: Great service, and very knowledgeable.

resp.text: thank you Ben! We appreciate your business!

name: Brad Wingo
text: Cahaba Cycles is great with awesome service.  We were coming through town staying with relatives on the way to the beach and one of our bikes’ brake cable almost snapped from the bike rack. Mike repaired the cable on the spot as we waited on a very busy Saturday.

name: jennifer Gamble
text:
Friendly and knowledgeable employees. They really went the extra mile to put my son’s birthday present
( bike) together in a timely manner. He loves his present!

name: Wesley Slappey
text: Only place I will ever go for bike things. Great service and knowledgeable staff.

name: Brian Barrett
text: Birmingham's best Local Bike Shop. Sarah, Virginia & Ryan helped me get the stuff I needed, got my bike adjusted and ready to ride again. Thanks!

name: Josh Firth
text: Great customer service, helpful in finding products, and competitive prices.

name: Barathi Chinnappan
text: If you need repairs I wouldn’t go here. I took my older Trek in for a tune up. The guy was rude and barely touched it before saying it wasn’t worth fixing. I took the same bike to a shop downtown and they were very friendly and did the tune up within a week.

name: Katherine Dease
text: I love my local bike shop.  I get great service with a friendly smile.  I also love seeing the Cahaba Cycles van and technicians out on the race course for quick tune-ups.  It shows you care and are dedicated to the safety and fun of the sport.  Keep it up and we will keep supporting you.

resp.text: Thanks Kathrine! Its nice to hear some good feedback form our efforts! Appreciate your kind words.

name: Andy
text: Great bike shop! I'd definitely recommend!

name: Kelli Hutchens
text: Virginia was SO helpful over the phone and y’all are the only ones with 24 inch trek bikes in a Huge radius! So thankful for our random visit to Bham to see family and calling you!

name: Will Slappey
text: Staff is extremely knowledgeable and very helpful.  They have gotten me out of a pinch on multiple occasions with speedy service.

resp.text: Thank you Will!

name: Betsy
text: Friendly, knowledgeable service! Got great recs from the staff

name: John Hinson
text: The folks at Cahaba Cycles were great!  Very friendly and made sure I was set for my ride in short order. Will go there again, soon.

name: Jamorris Rivers
text: Great staff, very helpful. Virgina was incredibly insightful with the style and look that need on the road. She even provided recommendations for accessories and places to ride. So far, I’ve been super happy with its performance and especially the service care that I’ve received from Cahaba Cycles-Cahaba Heights.

resp.text: Thank you Jamorris! We really appreciate you taking the time to give us some feedback. Thank you for the kind words. Glad we could help! Happy Riding !

name: James Blumentritt
text: Had what I wanted at a great price!

name: Bill Levey
text: Prompt, professional service with curbside delivery too. A tremendous asset to our community!

name: Donovan Johnson
text: I usually don’t do reviews, but I had a great experience here. Chris was able to get me a great deal on a new Santa Cruz and I’d absolutely recommend at least considering these great folks if you’re in the market for a new bike. Great service and a friendly staff. Thank you!

resp.text: Thanks DJ - hope you're enjoying the new ride! Let us know how we can help in the future!

name: José Manuel
text: The sales person give my a good tour explain diferent choices and products details. She is a nice person.

resp.text: Thanks Jose! Really appreciate you taking the time. Thanks for your business!

name: Vicki Battan
text: Great customer service. Spent extended time with me answering all of my questions. No question was too silly, especially since I am new to cycling. Got my new bike fitted to me - went above and beyond to make sure it was just right. I got everything I needed and left feeling good about my purchases (new Trek bike, new shoes) and the price.

resp.text: Welcome aboard Vicki! and Thank you for your business AND the great feedback. We hope to see you out on the bike soon!

name: Sharon Bryant
text: Excellent experience !!!  I would recommend Cahaba Cycles to anyone interested in purchasing a bike or accessories.  The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable.

resp.text:
Thanks for taking the time Sharon! We really appreciate it and thank you for
you business!

name: Neil DeWitte
text: The employees at Cahaba Cycles in Cahaba Heights easily make this my favorite cycle shop in town. The mechanics are well-spoken, efficient, and knowledgeable; the sales staff are always willing to discuss new products and respectfully answer questions about technology that’s been around for a while. Cahaba Cycles is truly a first-class establishment.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Neil..very much appreciated!

name: Robert Comer
text: I took my mountain bike in to have a new fork installed. They completed the job faster than expected and even replaced a brake cable that was damaged. The customer service is always great when I visit Cahaba Cycles. If you need a bike repair, I would recommend Cahaba Cycles.

resp.text: Thanks Robert - very much appreciate your business! Faris Malki - owner

name: Mark Leo
text: Top notch mechanics and sales.

name: Matt Averett
text: Excellent customer service!  Thanks for taking care of my son's bike so quickly!

resp.text: Glad to have the opportunity. Appreciate you taking the time for feedback! Thanks Matt!

name: Joshua Williams
text: I’ve never had a bad experience with any of the guys  or gals at Cahaba Cycles. Extra points to the crew that diagnosed / fixed the phantom frame creaks coming from my Fuel Ex 9.7 last week! Felt great to leave the trailhead yesterday on a carbon frame that didn’t sound like it was falling apart underneath me.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Joshua. Hope to see you in the shop soon!

name: Ellen Hamilton
text: They have a quick turn around time for bike repairs and are attentive and helpful

resp.text: Thank you Ellen. Very much appreciated. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Trevor Kaple
text: Superior customer service with top quality products.

name: Ginny Smith
text: Great experience!! Loved the sweet girl that helped us!! She was so patient with Huck our 8 year old💕 Very knowledgeable too!!

name: Bryan Becker
text: Always friendly, helpful, and looking out for the customer.

name: Rachel Martinez
text: Staff and service is great here. Sarah helped me get set up with some great gear. The fit I received was great. They greet you by name every time you come in.

resp.text: Thank you Rachel! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Glenn Kinstler
text: Great staff.  I've been to Cahaba Heights and Homewood stores, and they're great (and they overlap).  Super friendly, helpful, AND THEY LISTEN!!

name: Walter Berry
text: The nicest, most knowledgeable bicycle shop I have ever been around.  They calmly take you through all of your questions....

resp.text: Thanks Walter! Very kind of you.

name: Bryan McCullar
text: Had to order the bike I wanted.  Everyone kept me updated, by phone and email,  every step of the way.  They worked hard to help me find and buy the specific bike I wanted.This was my first Road Bike purchase.  Sarah had the guys in the back add my accessories.  John set a proper saddle height and handlebar angle.  Both were very friendly and helpful, answering all my questions.I shopped a lot of cycling shops before finding which bike and shop to choose.  You can forgo all that trouble.  For the best cycling service within 90 miles of Birmingham, go straight to Cahaba Cycles in Cahaba Heights.  There’s no reason to go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you Bryan! We appreciate it very much!

name: Mathew M.
text: Service dept is HORRIBLE! Bought a brand new Trek for my son. As soon as he tried it it was obvious one shifter didnt work at all and the rear derailleur was never adjusted. Tech refused to own that they didnt check it well before sending it out. Ordered shifter never called me to let me know. Installed shifter, never called me to let me know it was done. When I picked the bike up the rear tire was missing entire sections of tread and both tires have red mud on them even though my son only rode in the grass. Again, tech refuses to take ownership of the problem and points to me. Taken my bike there twice for repairs/adjustments but nothing is ever fixed. They also take over a week to receive brake pads for bikes they stock. Why on earth do you not stock such a common part? Service guys cannot handle a task as simple as documenting my phone number. I had to chase them around. Will never do business with them again. Wish there was a zero star option.

name: Abraham Schuster
text: Farris , Sarah, and their team treat you like family.  Relationships, expertise, and service are required to survive in an “online” world.  Cahaba cycles will thrive .

resp.text: Thanks Abe - and thank you for all your business over the years! Its always a pleasure!

name: Wes Burton
text: The team at Cahaba Cycles is very knowledgable about their products and highly focused on customer service.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Wes! We appreciate your business!

name: Stephen Hayes
text: Gotta love this shop.  Great selection in inventory. If they don't have it, they will get it for you.  The staff cannot be beat.  They all know their stuff and genuinely want you to have as much fun on a bike as they do

resp.text: Thanks for the kinds words, Stephen!

name: Brad Roberson
text: These guys are awesome! As soon as I walked through the door Joe and Sarah greeted me with a smile  and I felt like everyone went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure that I felt like a family member there. They took the time to talk with me about a bike that I didn’t even buy from them, but were kind to me and very knowledgeable about my bike. I had a difficult situation on the bike I had purchased, but there mechanics dove right in and accepted the challenge. They were very reasonable ok their prices and again their service was superb! Thank you so much to the whole staff at Cahaba Cycles in Cahaba Heights!!! You guys ROCK!!!

resp.text: Thanks Brad - we appreciate you!

name: Ken Harper
text: Very professional and friendly.  I drive over 4 hours one way to get service at Cahaba Heights.

resp.text:
Thanks Ken - very much
appreciated!

name: Matthew Colson
text: Some of the best customer service I've encountered. I'm buying some used bikes for me and my wife bc we are intermediate riders and the staff has been phenomenal in helping me find the right bikes and educating me. 1000% recommend.

name: Stanley Holditch
text: Friendly staff and great prices

name: Robert Lane
text: I’ve beento two of their locations and felt very welcomed at both. Great customer service.

resp.text: Thanks Robert - stop in and see us again soon!

name: Todd Quire
text: Great place always friendly and helpful staff also convenient when I'm in bham or trussville

resp.text: Glad we could help Todd! See you soon...

name: David Phillips
text: Got me in on short notice to fix shifting problems on a Di2. My bike has never shifted better! I drive from the Montgomery area to come here and it is worth the extra effort. Thanks Again to the entire staff.

name: Martín Moya
text: Very helpful staff, big inventory, highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Martin - appreciate you taking the time!

name: Samuel Solliday
text: I love Cahaba Cycles they always treat me right with service bikes sales and they are always very friendly.

name: BruceQC Hamilton
text: The service department went above and beyond to get my bike back on the trails. It was much appreciated.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Bruce! We really appreciate it! Hope to see you out on the trails!

name: The real Buster
text: Always helpful, the folks at Cahaba are the best!

name: roxas the rogue
text: Staff is just amazing, all very friendly, but prices are little high when getting repairs.

name: Cheesegnarfle
text: People are nice

name: lineacademy
text: Cahaba Cycle wrote the book on customer service.

name: Elliott Pike
text: Knowledgeable staff, good selections, great value!

name: Fernando Garza
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly team.

resp.text: Hello Fernando! Thanks for the compliment. We appreciate you!

name: Bart Combs
text: always friendly, always helpful, very knowledgeable

name: Ann Pierce
text: Cahaba Cycles is the best!

resp.text: Thank you Ann!

name: Paul Kinsella
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thank you Paul!

name: Fred D
text: excellent

name: Chad Hathorne
text: Professional and helpful

name: Racolene Rogers
text: Great customer service

name: Jeffrey Florio
text: They do not purchase used bikes as advertised on their website. Only exchange.

resp.text: Hi Jeffrey..We do purchase bikes as advertised. However, we only purchase those that fit our needs and requirements at that time. It is probable that the bike you brought by was not one that we were interested in purchasing. My apologies for any confusion.

name: Yung Cherry
text: Website said the place was open, drove a whole hour and half out of my way just to find out they are closed the entire week, so thanks, won't be making my way back.

resp.text: Dear Krunch - There must be some confusion here. The only day we ever close at this location is on Sundays, and 4 holidays (Christmas, Thanksgiving, 4th of July, and New Years) We have NEVER closed for an entire week, or even 2 days in a row for that matter. Please try us again. Our hours are posted on our website..www.cahabacycles.com

name: Brian Wood
text: These guys are great and make you feel extremely welcome. Very helpful and super knowledgeable. If they don’t have it they will order it for you and make sure you get what you need. The prices are very fair and the shop is super nice too. I highly recommend stopping by. Way better than the other shops in town!

name: Luke Caldwell
text: I couldn't recommend a better bike shop in the Auburn area. Eddie is a super nice guy and loves to make sure you are getting what you need. And Raleigh is a class-act mechanic. There's not another person I trust with my bike more. These guys really care about their customers and want them to be able to enjoy riding their bikes because that is what it's all about.

name: Josh Cissell
text: Awesome shop! Everyone inside was very helpful. Tons of great gear. I was in town for a NICA race and had an emergency repair. They took care of me asap.

name: Jin Elkins
text: Always helpful. Great selection of bikes and parts.

name: daniel butler
text:
James Bros....Well Done.  On a five point scale, you all earn a six.

After all these years, I thought it important to write down how wonderful these folks are and what an awesome bike shop they have.  The Auburn area is most fortunate to have this asset in our community.

I purchased my first mountain bike 5 years ago from James Bros when they were still located in the bank building.  Although a novice at the beginning, I was helped to find a bike that would meet my needs.  I was not oversold.  I was fitted both in terms of how I would ride, my budget and my overall enjoyment with the sport of trail / mountain biking.

Well three bikes later, two for my daughter and one more for me, and I am still extremely satisfied with everything the team does for me and my daughter.  I have upgraded to soft tails and happy I have done so.  James Bros does an excellent job of keeping my bike(s) operating safely.  I cannot stress the term "safely" enough.  If you have loose or worn out parts, you are putting your life in jeopardy on the trials in the area.  The staff at James Bros makes sure everything that goes out the door is ready to ride - safely.

Eddie and Raleigh offer sound, professional advice.  They do NOT try to sell you something you do not need.  They DO make sure what you ride is safe and enjoyable.  They listen to you.  Really listen.  They find price points and products to fit your needs.  James Bros does not sell "cheap" products.  They offer solid value for the money for quality bikes and service.  If you need something they do not have in stock, they will find it.  They will service it.  They will back it up every time.

One example of how they help.   I needed a locking device for my new soft tail.  Eddie could have easily sold me what was in stock or even ordered a cable set.  However, that is not really what I needed.  So, he  suggested going a big box building store - Lowes - get a long length of plastic coated cable, a good lock and make the custom cable I needed for transporting and storing the bike in my truck.  Problem solved.  And he did it knowing he could have sold me a short cable set that would NOT have met my needs.

Each time I stop by, I am greeted as if I were an old friend.  That is how they treat everyone.  I would like to think I am special.  Perhaps.  But they treat everyone as an old special friend.   There has been more than one time when I have arrived near closing time when the team went ahead, took the bike in, and had it serviced before the end of the next day.  Eddie even came in when the shop was technically closed to help me with a part that was misbehaving.

Overall, I want to make sure folks know James Bros is a well respected bike shop.  If you need something, they will find it and help you with it.  Regardless of your skill or budget, James Bros will work with and for you.
Thank you for many years of a happy biking.

Sincerely,
Danny Butler

name: Erica Zacek
text: Helpful staff, good rental selection, good shop swag to browse. I was around for one weekend day in January and was thankful for the shop. Chewacla is a gem to have in their backyard.

name: Mike Lunsford
text: I highly recommend James Brothers Bikes in Auburn! Cameron and the owner Eddie were very knowledgeable and helpful. They weren't pushy like some places you go too. I will definitely buy from them again.

name: John W
text: Favorite bike shop! Highly recommend! Buy from here...very professional.

name: Stephen Hayes
text:
Awesome shop.  I was visiting one weekend and my bike was in the shop but I wanted to ride Chewacla.  The staff was great - they set me up on a nice rental, told me all I needed to know about the trails and also had a good talk about some new bikes when I got back.  Great guys.  My rental was only for 6 hours but they treated it like I was buying the bike making sure it was setup perfectly for me in every aspect. That is quality service...

Also, the shop was very well stocked - especially considering it is in a smaller town. I'm impressed.

name: Philip Faris
text: A+, 5 star, absolutely fantastic bike shop! I was in Auburn for a bike race and needed a quick repair to keep my bike going through the weekend. I arrived at the shop about 30 minutes before they closed to get it fixed and the entire staff was open and willing to help me out. They made sure my bike was taken care of and fixed properly. A big shout out to Raleigh, one of the members on staff, for being extra helpful and making sure everything was taken care of. I highly recommend this bike shop!

name: Russell Suther
text: Could not have found a better bike shop anywhere, staff was very helpful and not pushy in helping me find an outstanding bike for my grandson.

name: Joe Allen Dickerson
text: The entire team at James Bros Bikes are incredibly helpful! I've gotten my bikes maintenanced here, and they will give you a quote and even places that are need work. They even offer texting as an option for contact! Their technicians operate quickly and can offer incredible advice on what to ride and how to maintain your bike as you ride. There's plenty of room to park and it's easy to find from the road.

name: Bruno Ulrich
text: Been working with James Brothers Bike for over four years re maintenance on my two bikes.  I've never been disappointed in the quality of service, nor regarding their advise with respect to accessories. Danny and Amanda's integrity is above reproach.  I always feel welcomed, as has anyone I've ever seen enter the store.  I highly recommend customers visit their two stores; and, yes, staff at both the Auburn and Opelika make you feel just as welcomed as Amanda and Danny, and offer their advise with expertise be it road, travel, or mountain bikes.

name: Randall Plaisance
text: I usually have an idea of what I want - but Danny helps me figure it out exactly.  Then his crew makes everything fast and easy.  Quick set ups and quick high quality service.

name: Christopher McGrath
text: They repaired my 21 speed townie in the time frame they promised. They had convenient Saturday hours  and they are open until 6 most weekdays. The price was reasonable, the people were polite, the work was fast.

name: Tiger Limo
text: Great customer service. Will pair you up work what you want.

name: William Pavelec
text: A great place for knowledgeable people, who really go above and beyond, to take care of your needs. A real pleasure to do business with!

name: William Brawner
text: Great place to buy a bike.  Danny and the staff are helpful and knowledgeable.  Very patient with all my questions.  They offered a large selection of bikes and never came across as pushy with their recommendations.  Once I decided on a bike they got it ordered and ready to go quickly and when I picked it up all the accessories I had requested were already installed on the bike.  And I got the bike for a very fair price as well.  Highly recommend these guys.

name: Chris Cochrane
text:
WOW... I was looking for a great relationship out of a bike shop and, I finally found one!  It's hard to find that 'feel' that your business is appreciated. We're new to cycling and, it's a perfect way to exercise as I recover through paralysis and such. We live in Florida, but as Auburn grads, my wife and myself spend a lot of time in Auburn visiting my mother.  We decided to check it out and, we're very glad that we did! You won't be disappointed!

These guys HAVE to be commended on the personal service helping a handicapped man and his family. For instance, as I already mentioned being cycling newbies, we needed to find a car carrying method easy for us with my limitations and, find a specific trailer hitch/bike carrier that my wife can easily use without help.  A couple of phone calls later... the 'Hollywood Sport Rider' fit our needs perfectly and, showed up in two days! When we came-in to pick it up, they had ALREADY ASSEMBLED it for us!!  The thing is like a jigsaw puzzle! They didn't charge us to assemble it AND, the company is big on giving to the Active Duty a Military discount... I wish more American shops/stores/services etc., embrace the James Bros Bikes business model.  Thank you so much guys!  Can't wait until the next time! Cheers!

name: Shawn Wheeler
text: Very knowledgable and friendly, great products and good prices. Just bought my first 29'er from them and couldn't be happier, look forward to doing business with them again.

name: Keith Thompson
text: James Bros. is the best!  Awesome service and great people. I will always do my biking business with James Bros.

name: Noah Triplett
text: Nice shop, everybody was friendly and helpful.  All employees were very nice. Will make more purchases soon.

name: David Mackinnon
text: We stopped by this shop during our trip out of town from South Florida.  We were mountain biking in Chewacla Park for Memorial weekend.  We dealt with Danny James and the service and attention to detail was awesome.  We had a beginner without a bike with us and had to rent one,  normally the rentals would be for 24 hours but since they wouldn't be open the following day we would have needed to get the bike back to the shop before closing (4pm) Danny went out of his way to get our contact information and personally pick up the bike from us the following day so that our beginner could really get a good chance to enjoy the trails.  He also took the time to point out great trails and sites we should see before we depart.  When we got the bike he took the extra time to fit the bike to our rider and make sure the shocks and tires all had the correct pressures.  I've rented bikes from other shops and have yet seen anyone else take this extra time and effort.  Any time I'm in the area you can bet on me returning to this shop for my needs.

name: Ronald Shaw
text: This is my bike shop of choice. The staff is super and the products are quality. I may look at bikes in other stores but when I am ready to make a purchase, you will find me at James Brothers!

name: Darren Berry
text: Good service and nice courteous staff.

name: Caroline Donnelly
text: Took our Surly Trolls in to have new chains installed and a general safety check. Taylor did a fantastic job . We love James Brothers bikes and wouldn't go anywhere else . Super service and always with a smile.

name: Randall Marshall
text: Excellent service and selection. Wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Carter Brown
text: Great service and selection. Best bike shop around.

name: thomas colbert
text: Very helpful in finding parts I needed! Best bike shop in Auburn!

name: Sam Bartlett
text: Great store, very helpful and friendly employees.

name: Allen Adams
text: Great local bike shop!

name: Kendall Simmons
text: 2nd to none!
